title: Messaging a web extension's native app | Apple Developer Documentation
metaDescription: Learn how a Safari web extension communicates with a native app.
author: Apple
selectionText: Safari web extensions can communicate with a native app using messages.
fullText: Safari web extensions can communicate with native apps through a structured message protocol. The host app should validate protocol versions and payload shape, then produce deterministic local markdown output for capture workflows.

headings.text: Messaging a web extension's native app
